pullrequest.title: scale logo to fit in sidebar in generated docs

content.raw: Btw, as you can't easily inspect this change, what I did was to use GIMP to scale the image to 150px in width (aspect ratio preserved).  I chose that size because it looks good to me in the sidebar.
content.html: Btw, as you can't easily inspect this change, what I did was to use GIMP to scale the image to 150px in width (aspect ratio preserved). I chose that size because it looks good to me in the sidebar.
